plot: We all fear it, dying alone. A single woman searches for a husband, and for a way of easing her dying father's worries.
title: Dworzec
plot_es: We all fear it, dying alone. A single woman searches for a husband, and for a way of easing her dying father's worries.
plot_en: We all fear it, dying alone. A single woman searches for a husband, and for a way of easing her dying father's worries.
